title: IStraightElementData.FitType
description: Gets or sets the fit type for this straight hole element.
returns: Fit type as defined in swStraightHoleFitType_e
remarks:
This property is valid only if
IAdvancedHoleElementData::FastenerType
is set to
swWzdHoleStandardFastenerTypes_e
.swStandard*ScrewClearances.
